description:
Vovsoft Convert Video to Audio is a simple and efficient software designed to extract sound from video files.

Vovsoft Convert Video to Audio is a simple and efficient software designed to extract sound from video files. This software is a perfect solution for those who want to convert their video files into audio formats, enabling them to enjoy audio content without requiring video playback.

This tool can create a sound collection from videos like recorded camera footage. Wrapped in an intuitive interface, this program features basic options for helping you obtain the audio stream of video files in order to produce sound tracks with the MP3, WMA, FLAC, WAV, AIFF, AAC, M4A, OGG, OPUS, AC3, EAC3 formats. You can click the "Audio Settings" button to change bitrate, sampling rate, audio channels and more.

The software supports a wide range of video formats, including MP4, MKV, AVI, MPEG, MOV, WMV, FLV, F4V, and WEBM, along with popular video codecs such as AV1, H.264, H.265 (HEVC), and VP9â€”ensuring that users can convert virtually any video file they have. It can convert these video files into various audio formats. Users can choose FLAC or WAV for increased quality, or MP3 for a more compact recording, among other supported formats such as WMA, OGG, OPUS, and AAC.
